text: Petroleum and Natural Gas Regulatory Board (PNGRB) (Hindi : पेट्रोलियम और प्राकृतिक गैस नियामक बोर्ड ) is a statutory body in India, constituted under the act of Parliament of India, namely Petroleum and Natural Gas Regulatory Board Act, 2006. Its primary functions include regulation of refining, transportation, distribution, storage, marketing, supply and sale of petroleum products and natural gas. ==Composition== Present composition is as follows * D.K. Sarraf (Chairperson) * Satpal Garg (Member, C&M;) * Dr. S.S. Chahar (Member, Legal) * S. Rath (Member, I&T;) * Vandana Sharma (Secretary) ==References== Category:Energy regulatory authorities Category:Regulatory agencies of India Category:Institutions of Petroleum in India
title: Petroleum and Natural Gas Regulatory Board
